results.content: As always, Brent delivers an excellent easy to understand course.  It’s almost like he is there in the room with you.
results.content_html: As always, Brent delivers an excellent easy to understand course. It’s almost like he is there in the room with you.

results.content: I learned a lot about techniques that I would not have realised before, worked out the projects and noticed a real enhancement in my drawing work. Everything gets clearer, now it is a matter of practice. Before I was drawing mainly on iPad, meanwhile I switched to a block of paper and pencils :-)

results.content: Very interesting course. Even if it's a course for beginners, you can get drawing foundations as well as inspirations for creative drawings. Recommended.
results.content_html: Very interesting course. Even if it's a course for beginners, you can get drawing foundations as well as inspirations for creative drawings. Recommended.

results.content: Brent is clear, gives great examples and breaks the concepts into easy, understandable steps.  I highly recommend his courses!
results.content_html: Brent is clear, gives great examples and breaks the concepts into easy, understandable steps. I highly recommend his courses!

results.content: Brent Eviston is a brilliant teacher. The way in which he explains how to see lines is exciting. I never thought Of lines as emotional in a drawing. I’m really enjoying these courses and I love learning how to see the world and objects as more than just drawings. Brent has taught me how to draw objects that they feel more realistic.
results.content_html: Brent Eviston is a brilliant teacher. The way in which he explains how to see lines is exciting. I never thought Of lines as emotional in a drawing. I’m really enjoying these courses and I love learning how to see the world and objects as more than just drawings. Brent has taught me how to draw objects that they feel more realistic.

results.content: Sullivan's book, "Line: An Art Study" made me fall in love with line and Mr. Eviston's explorations of it only add to my love affair! Yes, lines do have a psychology attached to them just as does color, and critical decisions are made in any art project about where, how, and when to use and place lines as well as what characteristics they are to have. These notions are wonderfully explored in this course, especially in the Tactile Line and Atmospherics classes. My favorite is the drawing sequence for a rock. I think they are difficult to draw, and Mr. Eviston demonstrates some strategies that have been helpful and problem-solving for it. He has created more classes, and I look forward to advancing my skills in the next! Dave in California

results.content: This was good. It was a little short for a whole course, but I thought there was a great deal of value. I especially liked the examples of Light and Heavy and Hard and Soft.

results.content: I think these courses are great and are helping me a lot.  I can even recognize the objects I am drawing and the different effects created.

results.content: I am just amazed by what I can already draw and explore at the end of this course two of the series. Absolutely amazing!

results.content: This course is great! I only bought it because it was a part of the set, but now I realise how much I'd be missing if I didn't buy it
results.content_html: This course is great! I only bought it because it was a part of the set, but now I realise how much I'd be missing if I didn't buy it

results.content: I really enjoyed this class. I must have been absent when mark making was covered in my college art class. What a difference it makes in bringing your subject to life. Brent is an excellent teacher. He knows his material and expresses it to the student in a manner where it makes perfect sense. He has a calm, easy style of teaching that motivates you to do your assignments. I am walking away from this class excited and looking for ways to apply what I learned.

results.content: This course is great for understanding drawings,it not only teaches you some drawing techniques,it teaches you how to analyse drawings.
